text: 提示：You have divergent branches and need to specify how to reconcile them.提示：You can do so by running one of the following commands sometime ...
content:
提示：You have divergent branches and need to specify how to reconcile them.
提示：You can do so by running one of the following commands sometime before
提示：your next pull:
提示：
提示： git config pull.rebase false # merge (the default strategy)
提示： git config pull.rebase true # rebase
提示： git config pull.ff only # fast-forward only
提示：
提示：You can replace “git config” with “git config –global” to set a default
提示：preference for all repositories. You can also pass –rebase, –no-rebase,
提示：or –ff-only on the command line to override the configured default per
提示：invocation.
fatal: Need to specify how to reconcile divergent branches.
